title: Social Cloud-Based Embedded Engineering Creativity Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of electronics and programming concepts
context.additional_context: Building collaborative learning environments using smartphones and social cloud platforms

learning_goals: Learners can explain the embedded systems design process by dividing it into at least three stages.
Learners can conduct real-time prototype design with team members using cloud-based collaboration tools.
Learners can implement a sensor-integrated system with at least two sensors using smartphone-based development tools.
Learners can iteratively improve project outcomes at least three times through formative assessments.

resources: Cloud collaboration tools (Google Drive, Notion, etc.)
Open-source embedded OS (e.g., Arduino, Raspberry Pi)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
